p: The authors searched PubMed/MEDLINE databases in March 2020. Articles related to the topic were identified by following terms: “Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome”, “Middle East Respiratory Syndrome”, Coronavirus disease 2019”, “Neurology”, “MERS”, “SARS”, “COVID-19”, “Stroke”, “Epilepsy”, “Guillain-Barré Syndrome”, “Encephalitis”, “Myelitis”, “Meningitis”, “Neurological Sequels”, “Polyneuropathy” and “Carotid Dissection”.
